name: Ghost Sword
description:
You are awakened in the night by a voice from behind your bedroom closet door.  It leads you to the Sword of Paralys, a powerful weapon that grants you vision into the Spirit World.

As the nights go on, can you protect your home from the invading ghosts and demons? Will you ever truly wake up?

SENSITIVITY CAN BE CHANGED WITH THE SCROLL WHEEL

WASD to move

Right-Click to look through the sword

Left-Click to attack

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 for the theme "It is not real".

This game was created by three students at Drexel University using the Unity engine. We used Maya for 3D modelling and Substance Painter for texturing. 

We really hope you enjoy it, as this was our first Game Jam together as a group.
